topics.author: 509f70a87f123b77eb0004fd

topics.body:
Honestly after watching all of the movies
That was definitly the best one
I think the updated animation quality and extra running time helped

But also Beerus is the fucking best

The fact that Beerus did actually win, but didn't destroy Earth anyways was honestly kind of surprising
It's the first time the characters straight up lost


And I have to say now that I've gone through the entire series, the original, Z, GT, the movies

I fucking love it all

I loved as a kid and I still love it

I feel like I might start getting a bit emotional
Like tears
